attributes.action: apologize for the prosecution and hanging of Temperance Lloyd, Susanna Edwards & Mary Trembles for witchcraft in Essex on 25th August 1682.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These women (amongst many others) were persecuted and killed by the English Government for something which is not a crime today. In the light of recent apologies to other people by the Prime Minister it is only fitting that the English Prime Minister should apologise for the sins of his predecessors.
